results.title: BRASH Syndrome: A Case Report
results.text_hl: A 76-year-old man with @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease@@@ stage 3, essential @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Psoriasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@, and receiving @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ presented to the Emergency Department with @DISEASE_Lethargy @DISEASE_MESH:D053609 @@@lethargy@@@ and @DISEASE_Muscle_Weakness @DISEASE_MESH:D018908 @@@weakness@@@ that started 3 days ago, with rapid deterioration into @DISEASE_Shock @DISEASE_MESH:D012769 @@@shock@@@.

citations.NLM: Bailuni Neto JJ, Siqueira BL, Machado FC, Boros GAB, Akamine MAV, Cordeiro de Paula LJ, Rodrigues de Assis AC, Soares PR, Scudeler TL. BRASH Syndrome: A Case Report Am J Case Rep. 2022 Jan 21;23():e934600. PMID: 35058422
citations.BibTeX: @article{35058422, title={BRASH Syndrome: A Case Report}, author={Bailuni Neto JJ and Siqueira BL and Machado FC and Boros GAB and Akamine MAV and Cordeiro de Paula LJ and Rodrigues de Assis AC and Soares PR and Scudeler TL}, journal={Am J Case Rep}, volume={23}, pages={e934600}}

citations.NLM: Wakefield PE, Berger TG, James WD. Atenolol-induced pustular psoriasis. Arch Dermatol. 1990 Jul;126(7):968-9. PMID: 2141782
citations.BibTeX: @article{2141782, title={Atenolol-induced pustular psoriasis.}, author={Wakefield PE and Berger TG and James WD}, journal={Arch Dermatol}, volume={126}, number={7}, pages={968-9}}

results.title: Clopidogrel: A possible exacerbating factor for psoriasis
results.text_hl: Treatment for @<m>DISEASE_Psoriasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@, stopping @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and substituting @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Clopidogrel @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077144 @@@clopidogrel@@@ did not benefit.

citations.NLM: Mahajan VK, Khatri G, Prabha N, Abhinav C, Sharma V. Clopidogrel: A possible exacerbating factor for psoriasis Indian J Pharmacol. 2014 Jan-Feb;46(1):123-4. PMID: 24550599
citations.BibTeX: @article{24550599, title={Clopidogrel: A possible exacerbating factor for psoriasis}, author={Mahajan VK and Khatri G and Prabha N and Abhinav C and Sharma V}, journal={Indian J Pharmacol}, volume={46}, number={1}, pages={123-4}}

results.title: Clinicopathologic retrospective analysis of annular pustular psoriasis.
results.text_hl: We present two cases of @<m>DISEASE_Psoriasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@APP@@@ with diagnostic problems: a 65-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ that suffered from intermittent @<m>DISEASE_Psoriasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@APP@@@ with remission and exacerbation for many years, and an 83-year-old man with lesions that developed after @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Owczarczyk-Saczonek A, Znajewska-Pander A, Owczarek W, Maciejewska-Radomska A, Placek W. Clinicopathologic retrospective analysis of annular pustular psoriasis. Acta Dermatovenerol Alp Pannonica Adriat. 2018 Dec;27(4):215-219. PMID: 30564836
citations.BibTeX: @article{30564836, title={Clinicopathologic retrospective analysis of annular pustular psoriasis.}, author={Owczarczyk-Saczonek A and Znajewska-Pander A and Owczarek W and Maciejewska-Radomska A and Placek W}, journal={Acta Dermatovenerol Alp Pannonica Adriat}, volume={27}, number={4}, pages={215-219}}

results.title: Psoriasis related to angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors.
results.text_hl: The second @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ developed an @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@-induced, mild plantar @<m>DISEASE_Psoriasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@.

citations.NLM: Wolf R, Tamir A, Brenner S. Psoriasis related to angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors. Dermatologica. 1990;181(1):51-3. PMID: 2203659
citations.BibTeX: @article{2203659, title={Psoriasis related to angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors.}, author={Wolf R and Tamir A and Brenner S}, journal={Dermatologica}, volume={181}, number={1}, pages={51-3}}
